member.name: T:Linkar.LkData.LkItems
member.summary: This class is to implement List of the LkItems.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.LstDictsId
member.summary: Array with the dictionary names for record Ids. The same array for each LkItem that is stored in the list.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.LstDicts
member.summary: Array with the dictionarty names for record fields. The same array for each LkItem that is stored in the list.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.LstDictsCalculated
member.summary: Array with the dictionary names for calculated fields of the record. The same array for each LkItem that is stored in the list.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LkItem class.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Indexer to get a LkItem using its RecordId.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.Add(Linkar.LkData.LkItem)
member.summary: Adds a new LkItem to the list. The dictionaries arrays of the list, will be copied to the LkItem added.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.Add(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates and adds LkItem with specific recordIds to the list.
member.param: Array with the list of recordIds

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.RemoveId(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the LkItem specified by its recordID from the list.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.ComposeReadBuffer
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the all record in the list that will be readed, in MV Read operations, with the RecordId information.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Read operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.ComposeUpdateBuffer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the all records in the list that will be updated, in MV Update operations, with the RecordId, the Record, and optionally the OriginalRecord information.
member.param: Determines if the OriginalRecord must be include or not in the final buffer string.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Update operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.ComposeNewBuffer
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the all records that will be created, in MV New operations, with the RecordId and the Record information.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV New operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItems.ComposeDeleteBuffer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the all records that will be deleted, in MV Delete operations, with the RecordId and optionally with the OriginalRecord information.
member.param: Determines if the OriginalRecord must be include or not in the final buffer string.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Delete operations.

member.name: T:Linkar.LkData.LkItem
member.summary: A LkItem is compose of three items: RecordId, Record and OriginalRecord. Depending on the operation, the three items may be present, or only some of them. Each LkItem can hold a list of dictionaries (for real fields, for ID fields, and for calculated fields)

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.LstDictsId
member.summary: Array with the dictionary names for record Ids.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.LstDicts
member.summary: Array with the dictionarty names for record fields.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.LstDictsCalculated
member.summary: Array with the dictionary names for calculated fields of the record.

member.name: F:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.RecordId
member.summary: The ID of the record.

member.name: F:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.Record
member.summary: The content of a record from database.

member.name: F:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.OriginalRecord
member.summary: A copy of the original record to be used in operations where the optimistic lock option is enabled.

member.name: F:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.Calculated
member.summary: The content of calculated fields from database.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LkItem class.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer that set or get fields, multivalues or subvalues from the record.
member.param: The field number to get or set.
The multivalue number to get or set.
The subvalue number to get or set.

member.name: P:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.Item(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer that usign the dictionary name can set or get fields, multivalues or subvalues from the record.
member.param: The dictionary name to get or set.
The multivalue number to get or set.
The subvalue number to get or set.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.ComposeReadBuffer
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the record that will be readed, in MV Read operations, with the RecordId information.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Read operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.ComposeUpdateBuffer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the record that will be updated, in MV Update operations, with the RecordId, the Record, and optionally the OriginalRecord information.
member.param: Determines if the OriginalRecord must be include or not in the final buffer string.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Update operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.ComposeNewBuffer
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the record that will be created, in MV New operations, with the RecordId and the Record information.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV New operations.

member.name: M:Linkar.LkData.LkItem.ComposeDeleteBuffer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Composes the final buffer string of the record that will be deleted, in MV Delete operations, with the RecordId and optionally with the OriginalRecord information.
member.param: Determines if the OriginalRecord must be include or not in the final buffer string.
member.returns: The final string buffer for MV Delete operations.
